title: Did Fauci Say in 2005 Virology Journal That Hydroxychloroquine Can Treat SARS?
subtitle: Shockingly, a screenshot of an opinion piece excerpt omitted some important facts.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Dr. Anthony Fauci wrote in a 2005 paper published in Virology Journal that hydroxychloroquine was effective in treating SARS.
